name: Drodi´s Adventure
description:
Join the rooms of this ancient temple together, by arranging it's layout, to find the seven gems as you leap over deadly spikes.

Controlls:

- Use the arrow keys or w, a, s, d  to move your player and space to jump. 

- Press escape to zoom in / zoom out and move your camera with w, a, s, d or          arrow keys

- Select one of the three rooms by pressing the left mouse button

- Click on an empty space to place the selected room

- You may also replace rooms that you have placed yourself
